巘字的基本解释

巘
yǎn
大山上的小山：“陟则在巘。”

巘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎn］
［《廣韻》魚蹇切，上獮，疑。］
［《廣韻》語偃切，上阮，疑。］
亦作“巚1”。
(1)山；山顶。《诗·大雅·公刘》：“陟則在巘，復降在原。”毛传：“巘，小山，别於大山也。”朱熹集传：“巘，山頂也。”一说，巘为上大下小之山，参阅孔颖达疏。
(2)上大下小的山。
(3)险峻。参见“巘巘”。

巘字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　巘； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页323第09
【廣韻】魚蹇切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】語蹇切，?言上聲。【廣韻】山形如甑。一曰山峰。【張衡·南都賦】坂坻巀嶭而成巘。【沈約·鍾山詩】鬱律搆丹巘。　又叶魚軒切，音言。【詩·大雅】陟則在巘，復降在原。【謝靈運·山居賦】九泉別㵎，五谷異巘。叶下軒。　【正字通】六書故省作〈山鬳〉，非。

巘字的起名意思

1，山；山顶；2、上大下小的山； 3、险峻。

巘
Basic explanation of words
巘
yǎn
The hill on the mountain: "Zhi is here."
巘
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎn］
["Guangyun" fish scorpion cut, upright, suspicious. ]
["Guangyun" Yu Yanqie, Shang Ruan, doubt. ]
Also known as "巚1".
(1) Mountain; the top of the mountain. "Poetry·Daya·Gong Liu": "Zhi is in the market, and the return to the original." Mao Chuan: "Yang, the hill, different from the mountain." Zhu Xi's collection: "Yang, the top of the mountain." Go up and down the mountain, see Kong Yingdashu.
(2) Go up and down the small mountain.
(3) Precipice. See "巘巘".
巘
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji] [Mountain Character Department] 　巘; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 323 No. 09
[Guang Yun] Yu Jian cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] The language was cut, and the words sounded. [Guangyun] The shape of a mountain is like a retort. One is the peak. 【Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu】Bandi 坻巀巀巭 was formed. 【Shen Yue·Zhong Shan Poems】Yu Lv constructs Dan.　Ye Yuxuan cut again, Yinyan. 【Poetry·Daya】Zhi is in the air, returning to the original. [Xie Lingyun·Shanju Fu] Jiuquan Bie㵎, different grains. Ye Xia Xuan.　【Zhengzitong】The six books were made from the province "Mountain 鬳", not.
